name: Imposter Solo Attack
description:
The rule is simple: Hunt all the living crewmates, and escape through the vent to become the best imposter ever. Be careful though, if you get caught under enemy’s vision, you have to start over again.


HOW TO PLAY:
Use the joystick to move around, get close to any living crewmates to take them down. Jump into the vent to complete the level.


FEATURES:
- Easy to understand.
- One finger control.
- Countless levels, countless fun.
- Absolute free to play.
